title: «View in 3D» doesn't work - Pixel 4 XL
content:
On my Pixel 4 xl - search results for "supported animals" doesn't show the «View in 3D» option.
Tested with several animals (Eg. Tiger, hedgehog, shark, etc).
Tested both from Google app, and Chrome. 

Both phone, AR Core, Google and Chrome is updated from play. 
I have Beta version of Google app, but have also tested the stable version (both from the play store).

When searching from Incognito mode - the 3D option appears - but to view in AR - you have to exit Incognito mode - and I get the following error message (picture attached) 

Reboot, force close, clear cache tested for both Google app and Chrome. (also updated the phone to April update (OTA))
